ResearchProjectDef.label: moon sugar cane sowing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows sowing moon sugar cane, which can be used to create moon sugar and skooma.

ResearchProjectDef.label: moon sugar creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of moon sugar at drug labs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: moon sugar refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the refining of moon sugar into skooma at a drug lab.
